title: Organocatalytic enantioselective construction of Si-stereocenters: recent advances and perspectives
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00417E, Tutorial Review
Zhong-Tian Ye, Zhong-Wei Wu, Xue-Xin Zhang, Jian Zhou, Jin-Sheng Yu
This Tutorial Review discusses the evolution and expectation of enantioselective construction of Si-stereocenters by asymmetric organocatalysis.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
